 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרַס‎</span><sub>28</sub> **proper name, of a territory** ==Persia==, <span class="bdbLangGreek">περσῶν</span> (genitive), [[Dan.11.2|Dan 11:2]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">τῇ Περσίδι</span> ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] and <span class="bdbLangGreek">Θ</span>), [[2Chr.36.20|2Chr 36:20]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">Μήδων</span> (Old Persian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***Pârsa***</u></abbr>, ***Persian, Persia***, [[BDB#Spieg|Spieg]]<sup>APK 231</sup>, New Persian <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[2Chr.36.22|2Chr 36:22]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרָ֑ס‎</span> v[[2Chr.36.20|2Chr 36:20]] +; — in late literature, [[2Chr.36.20|2Chr 36:20]], v[[2Chr.36.22|2Chr 36:22]], 22, 23 = [[Ezra.1.1|Ezra 1:1]] (twice in verse); [[Ezra.1.2|Ezra 1:2]]; [[Dan.10.1|Dan 10:1]] + 11 t. Ezra Daniel + (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָדַי‎</span>) [[Esth.1.3|Esth 1:3]]; [[Esth.1.14|Esth 1:14]]; [[Esth.1.18|Esth 1:18]]; [[Esth.1.19|Esth 1:19]]; [[Esth.10.2|Esth 10:2]]; [[Dan.8.20|Dan 8:20]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פ‎</span> [[Ezek.27.10|Ezek 27:10]]; [[Ezek.38.5|Ezek 38:5]] is doubted by Toy (who, [[Ezek.27.10|Ezek 27:10]], reads <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כּוּשׁ‎</span>, after [[BDB#Gr|Gr]]), but [[BDB#Krae|Krae]] defends.
